Summary: A flame like object was coming from the southwest direction across hwy 65 and directly over the drive thru where I was working at McDonalds in Alabaster, Alabama. It was orange and had a gel like appearance.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was working at the McDonalds drive thru when I saw a massive orange object that looked like a flame but seemed to be made of a gel like appearance. It came from the southwest and passed directly over me in the drive thru. I experienced a burning sensation on my face.
trends: There have been 48 other sightings in Birmingham
There were no other sightings in Birmingham on or around February 15th 2009
